quotes.quote: A nerd's brain is the most sexiest thing on this planet.
Nerd life is so much better than regular life.
So you're a little weird? Work it! A little different? Own it! Better to be a nerd than one of the herd!
Everyone's a nerd inside. I don't care how cool you are.
A true nerd knows the difference between 2-D and 3-D, and chooses 2-D every frickin' time!

I read everything. I've always got a book on the go and I'm really nerdy about it, I get through books and don't remember anything about them afterwards. But I read all sorts, from classic to contemporary.
If you like nerds, raise your hand. If you don't, raise your standards.
That's what I love about geeks, that they can call themselves a geek and be proud of it. I love that.
I will take a serious approach to a subject usually treated lightly, which is a nerdy thing to do.
I think that nerds, if you want to call them that, have only gotten more hip and assimilated into the culture.
No one messes around with a nerd's computer and escapes unscathed.
Never argue with the data.
All the geniuses and greats are really just nerds with experience.
That's the wonderful thing with nerds: they're enthusiasts. Not having a life means you get to love things with a passion and nobody bothers you about it.
The nerds are the ones that make the films and do loads of other really cool stuff in their life.
Sitting by your side, I realised that you are the only proton whom I want to revolve and spend my lifetime, I feel, lets be the hydrogen model for the rest of our lives.
I get obsessed by little nerdy things in my corner that no one else is interested in.
Nerds are far more interesting human in later life.
Nerd. One whose unbridled passion for something defines who they are as a person, without fear of other people's judgment.
Wit seduces by signaling intelligence without nerdiness.
At a nerd wedding, they don't say, "I do." They say, "I accept the terms and condition.
My best definition of a nerd: someone who asks you to explain an aphorism.
Nerds are just deep, and neurotic, fans. Needy fans. We're all nerds, on one subject or another.
Charm is the ability to insult people without offending them; nerdiness the reverse.
Be nice to nerds. Chances are you'll end up working for one.
I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
Geeks are people who love something so much that all the details matter.
Nerds get caught up in minutiae, because there is a tremendous and fulfilling sesne of control in understanding every single detail of a thing more than any other living creature.
His nerdiness though repellant to the world, his wisdom grabbed the attention of his special one.
In fact, the world needs more nerds.
